12492255901397210166.Text: The shalk is a large, moderately aggressive beetle. Shalk resins are the tough, soluble substances extracted from shalk hides. Shalk resins are used as glues and stiffeners in manufacturing bonemold and chitin armors.

46177617236017139.Text: The shalk is a large, moderately aggressive beetle. Shalk resins are the tough, soluble substances extracted from shalk hides. Shalk resins are used as glues and stiffeners in manufacturing bonemold and chitin armors.
